testcase.name: Check Login with valid inputs and display a message Successful
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Signin Link.............................................passed Then check title of next page...............................................passed When user enter valid username..............................................passed And user enter valid password clicks on Submit button.......................passed Then Check user name is valid and display message as Login successful.......passed

testcase.name: Check Login with invalid inputs and display a error message
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Signin Link.............................................passed Then check title of next page...............................................passed When user enters invalid username and valid password clicks on Submit.......passed Then error message is displayed.............................................passed And user enter valid user name and invalid password clicks on Submit........passed Then error message is displayed.............................................passed
